BMDesc.message: 用層級結構的方式顯示書籤

BMFileDesc.message: 顯示所有書籤內容(不含資料夾、不做分層)
BMFileDesc.description: Show bookmark list in once. (File only)

BMAllDesc.message: 顯示所有書籤內容(不做分層)

ChromeExtHotkeyHTML.message: 擴充功能的快捷鍵設定
ChromeExtHotkeyHTML.description: Manage the hotkey of the extension.

CMDList.message: 顯示所有分頁的標題名稱
CMDList.description: Show the title of each tab.

CMDChromeHTML.message:
Chrome內建所提供的URL指令
您可以輸入chrome -h取得更完整的訊息
CMDChromeHTML.description:
The URLs provide by chrome.
Please use the chrome -h to see all full commands.

CMDArithmeticHint.message: 試試"= -help"來查看該如何使用
CMDArithmeticHint.description: Try typing "= -help" to see how to use it.

CMDVideo.description: Do some control of the video.

CMDVideoSpeedExample.message: 將視頻的撥放速度調整至$N$倍
CMDVideoSpeedExample.description: Change the video speed to $N$ times faster than the original.

CMDVideoREC.message: 您可以選擇{螢幕、視窗、網頁分頁}的其中一項，並進行錄製
CMDVideoREC.description: Record the screen, window, tabs to a video file.

CMDVideoRECOptions.message: 更改寬度、高度、FPS(每秒畫幾幀)。不鼓勵修改寬度和高度，這將會導致您得到較差的畫質。
CMDVideoRECOptions.description: Change the width, height, and FPS. I don't encourage you to change the width and height since it will get lower quality.

CMDBM.message: 您可以使用此指令來快速地打開書籤的連結
CMDBM.description: You can use this command to help you quickly open the URL of the bookmark that you made.
